DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study ass efficacy , safety tolerability two different weekly dos BMS-986089 ambulatory boy Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy ( DMD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Evaluate Efficacy , Safety , Tolerability BMS-986089 Ambulatory Boys With Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy
